item.arsenal.charge_halberd.desc: Alternates between spear and axe blade on use
item.arsenal.charge_halberd2_desc: When the charge is 15 or higher, it transforms into a halberd when used while crouching.
item.arsenal.soul_knight_great_sword.des: Sets enemies on fire or ignites the weapon when you are on fire.
item.arsenal.soul_knight_great_sword2.de: Activates skill when used while the weapon is on fire.
